content:
**Founding Festival Day Incursion**
Fort Grey, Albion

At 9am, in Williamstown, just as Guildmaster Hath started his speech, several portals from hell appeared. The Guildmaster stopped all actions and took to battle. Multiple Guild members and upstanding citizens also engaged in battle against demons while most civilians retreated into various safe zones. An emergency Guild wide announcement was made calling all able members to arms. Communications also confirmed the appearance of portals across much of Albion as well, limiting efforts to bring more reinforcements to Fort Grey and Williamstown.

...

While the attack was successfully repelled, much of Williamstown remain in ruins. Immediate relief efforts are being organized and sent across town and all over albion. Currently it is unclear what is the situation in areas beyond the Fort's vicinity.

It is also unclear what is the exact purpose of the invasion and what prompted the subsequent retreat. Corroborating accounts from other long distance detection and surveillance specialists and myself seem to indicate that the demons were searching for something. However, neither I nor anyone else was able to identify the demons taking anyone or thing. I speculate that the goal is to locate their target. And that their invasion may simply be a distraction and a preemptive strike to weaken the Guild for future activities.

*‚Äî Pathfinder Ilya*

https://discord.com/channels/796570401681309696/1163548340030554143

**Quest Submissions**
**REBUILD THE RUINS** - Do what you can to help the town recover. There's people to save, bodies to move, fires to put out and looters to quell. Self-directed work, but work that I have full faith you might accomplish.

**MESSAGE TO ALBION** - A Hellish invasion on Albionese soil is something the King must be informed of in person. Go out to speak with him and his councilors, and see what might be done to lend the peoples of Williamstown some aid.

**THE REGIMENT** - A regiment of soldiers has arrives to offer immediate assistance. Coordinate with them effectively to see where they might be most useful.

**DEATH FIRST TO VULTURES** - Given the state of their home, anti-social elements are likely to believe the Guild is in disarray. Go out to the nearby towns, villages and other settlements and expunge any banditry and the like you find fomenting there.

*‚Äî Quests declared by Guildmaster Hath*

Related Thread:
https://discord.com/channels/796570401681309696/1165720835508666409

**Movements in Visuden**
Gara, Laurellia

For several days now, we've been receiving intel from underground sources about movement across Visuden. At this stage, it is still unclear what the bigger picture is, however there is undoubtedly moves by the noble elite in Visuden that suggest this may be a national conflict. Their contacts have sent out feelers to the gauge the Guild's likelihood in taking a possible commission from the nation. I already plan on making for Fort Grey for the festival, and will be available to serve as a quest officiator should Visuden send a representative.

*‚Äî Pathfinder Ilya*

Related Thread:
https://discord.com/channels/796570401681309696/1163991175670280294

**Quest Submission: In the Shadows of Lithos**

Days before a festival in Lithos, capital of the Visuden Empire, signs of hostile elements arise. Visuden has requested the Guild's aid to keep the peace. Investigate the capital and protect the smiles of the innocent. Accepting Guild members of any rank. Expect anti-personnel combat. To accept, go to the Visuden Airship.

Confidential details: Below the streets of Lithos are an underground network of tunnels for flood and sewage management. Hostile enemies of Visuden have been spotted congregating in the labyrinthine subterrain. It is unknown who or what their purpose is, but Visuden fears them to be the long time enemy Eldor. Investigate their identity and plans and prevent any harm to the city.

*‚Äî Quest officiated by Pathfinder Ilya*

Related Thread:
https://discord.com/channels/796570401681309696/1166538294805405746

**Cult Investigations**
???, ???

I've been investigating rumors of yet another cult. They call themselves followers of Adix. At present their leader remains unknown, however rumors include talk of them being a healer and miracle worker. It is by such means that they seem to be attracting followers. Additional investigation is required.

*‚Äî Pathfinder Leon*
